alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan; Oklahoma; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:02AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lincoln, northeastern Oklahoma, southeastern Logan and northeastern Pottawatomie Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 502 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northeastern Oklahoma City, moving southeast at 35 mph. Additional storms are located near Chandler. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastern Edmond, Chandler, Jones, Stroud, Prague, Luther, Meeker, Davenport, Wellston, Carney, Arcadia, Sparks, Warwick, Kendrick, Fallis and Centerview. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 137 and 182. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
